meta.desc: Like MacOS, puts window in a new workspace when its maximized or full-screened and brings you back to original workspace when its unmaximized or unfull-screened or closed.
meta.desc_long:
Like MacOS, puts window in a new workspace when its maximized or full-screened and brings you back to original workspace when its unmaximized or unfull-screened or closed. 

Recommended to use with touchegg/fusuma/libinput multi finger swipe gestures.
